---
title: "Multiplying numbers in R"
---

To multiply numbers in R use `*`

```{r,fig.cap="Kurtosis of a standard Normal distribution"}
library(moments)

x_kurtosis = c()
for (i in 1:100) {
  x_norm = rnorm(1000)
  x_kurtosis[i] = kurtosis(x_norm)
  
}

plot(x_kurtosis,type="o",ylab = "Kurtosis",pch=16)
abline(h=3,col="red",lwd=2)

```
